law.catch_line: Provisions of KRS Chapter 137 and KRS 92.280 not to apply.
law.text: None of the provisions of KRS Chapter 137 and none of the provisions of KRS 92.280(2) shall apply to any operations on State Horse Park grounds wherein the commission shares in the receipts and proceeds of such operations.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1979.
